version_description:
This update brings background syncing of your activities, making it easier and faster to view and share your activities with ease.
We've also fixed some bugs and made performance improvements.

The Suunto app welcomes Suunto 9! We are thrilled to share that our new flagship watch is now available and compatible with the Suunto app.  We've shared some highlights in the app to help you get to know your new watch.

We’ve also fixed some bugs to make your experience even better! Happy Training!

Thanks for using the Suunto app and being a part of the Suunto community. We are updating the app regularly to provide the best possible experience. Keep your app updated to ensure you have the latest features. All new features will be highlighted here. This update includes performance improvements.

Your kudos are here! We are thrilled to share that with this update you can now connect all your new activities from Suunto app automatically to Strava.  View your Profile in the app to make the connection. Happy Training!

This release brings basic compatibility for Ambit3 and Traverse watches and EON Core and EON Steel Dive computers.
Also, you can now customize the data that you would like to share from your activity, for example the total ascent or calories- but the point is - you get to choose what you share!
As always, we fixed some bugs to make your Suunto app experience better.

This release brings some enhancements to route planning with Suunto app. You can now save a workout as a route, either one of your own, or from a friend. In addition you can now also import a route to Suunto app, more details in the app, let the adventures begin!
Also in this release is a newly designed view of your day’s activity and training, let us know what you think.

Thanks for using the Suunto app and being a part of the Suunto community. We are updating the app regularly to provide the best possible experience. Keep your app updated to ensure you have the latest features. All new features will be highlighted here.
This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thanks for using the Suunto app and being a part of the Suunto community. We are updating the app regularly to provide the best possible experience. Keep your app updated to ensure you have the latest features. All new features will be highlighted here.
This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

This release brings enhancements to your laps table. Depending if you want to see your elevation gain, average pace split or max heart rate, we’ve restyled the laps table so that now you can change the data that you want to analyze and see after your activity.

As always, we fixed some bugs to make your Suunto app experience better.

Thanks for using the Suunto app and being a part of the Suunto community. We are updating the app regularly to provide the best possible experience. Keep your app updated to ensure you have the latest features and best app performance. All new features will be highlighted here.
This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

This release makes it easier to track your daily activity with updated steps and calorie graphs.

Your next adventure just got easier to discover as you can now import your favourite route with a tap in the Map view.

We’ve also made some other minor enhancements and fixes to make your experience in the app better.
- Happy adventures!

Calendar summaries: see your weekly/monthly statistics and totals
Various improvements and bug fixes

- Explore a yearly summary of your activities and exercises
- DIVE: you can have your location added automatically or add a location manually
- DIVE: enhanced dive graphics and guidance on dive information
- Various improvements and bug fixes

• Save waypoints on your route to help you navigate
• Various improvements and bug fixes

This update breathes adventure and exploration. With My tracks you will see the history of your adventures in one view. Compare it against the Heatmaps and discover new tracks easily. New Popular routes are ready made routes that are generated from the millions of routes tracked by all of You. Popular starting points will show where your next adventure starts. With the updated home screen view in the app you now have a personalized app experience with the most important stats in place.

With the updated home screen view in the app you now have a personalized app experience with the most important stats in place.

- Now see more insights in your sleep trends
- Various improvements and bug fixes

Thank you for using Suunto app and for being a part of the Suunto community! We update Suunto app regularly to provide you with the best experience.

This update includes:

- See your tracks in the calendar view
- Choose activity type and time period when you view my tracks in map view
- See the distance you covered in your home screen view
- See stress and recovery in the day view (Suunto 3, Suunto 5 and Suunto 9)
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

Keep your app updated to make sure you have access to the latest features and the best app performance!

Thank you for using Suunto app and for being a part of the Suunto community! We update Suunto app regularly to provide you with the best experience.

This update includes:

- Check your daily HR in the day view when you have daily HR turned on (Spartans, Suunto 3, Suunto 5 and Suunto 9).
- View your sleep schedule to investigate your sleeping habits. This feature is available when you have sleep tracking turned on (Spartans, Suunto 3, Suunto 5 and Suunto 9).
- Share your yearly training summary with your friends.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

Keep your app updated to make sure you have access to the latest features and the best app performance!
